column1: What do you call a terrible german hot-dog stand owner? the wurst guy.
column3: Wurst refers to a type of German sausage, and it is also a play on the word worst, meaning of poor quality.
column4: The sausage vendor specializes in making high-quality sausage.
column5: The performance of the band at the festival was considered the worst of the year.

column1: What is a pirates favorite class in school? arrrrrrt class.
column3: Art refers to the creative subject in school, and it also sounds similar to arr, a stereotypical phrase used by pirates.
column4: She decided to major in fine arts to pursue her passion for painting.
column5: The art of negotiation is essential in business dealings.

column1: What did the jewish pedophile say? ay kid, go easy on the candy!
column3: Kid refers to a child, and it can also mean a young goat, often called a kid in farming.
column4: The kid enjoyed playing outside with friends after school.
column5: The farmer raised a few kids alongside the adult goats in the pasture.

column1: What did jupiter say to saturn when he found out saturn was pregnant? did you planet?
column3: Planet refers to a celestial body orbiting a star, and it can also sound like planned, referring to a calculated action.
column4: Earth is the third planet from the sun in our solar system.
column5: She had not planned to attend the concert until her friend invited her.
